thread.title: Watch Migos Perform “Bad and Boujee” on ‘Ellen’
thread.title_full: Watch Migos Perform “Bad and Boujee” on ‘Ellen’

author: Jacob Davey
title: Watch Migos Perform “Bad and Boujee” on ‘Ellen’
text:
Migos have taken their chart-topping global trap-anthem phenomenon “Bad and Boujee” to Ellen . Performing to a hyped-up audience, the trio played out a censored version of their hit single, but still managed to keep the same energy that they are renowned for in their live performances. Watch it above.
Despite this, various lyrics including “Whipping up dope with an Uzi” and “Smokin’ on cookie in the hotbox” are still heard being played out in the unusual environment of Ellen’s studio, broadcast to a largely middle-aged audience who will be questioning their sanity watching the Atlanta trio.
After the performance, DeGeneres posed backstage with the triumvirate and big racks of cash, with the richest of the four (DeGeneres) hilariously only actually holding $40: 
@Migos are my new three amigos. 
A post shared by Ellen (@theellenshow) on Feb 20, 2017 at 11:46am PST 

Revisit the original video for “Bad and Boujee” below.

In related music news, Calvin Harris has dropped new snippet of that upcoming Frank Ocean collaboration , and it seems like Offset from Migos will also feature on the track.
